channel.title: Dread Pirate Roberts on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Dread Pirate Roberts on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Bitcoin at new record highs, trading in China
item.description:
The price of Bitcoin has soared in recent months, even though the Dread Pirate Roberts was taken offline. A recent graph shows the currency trading above $800.
What has changed that would drive the price from $140 to $800? The only simple answer (right or wrong) is China. The South China Morning Post reports - A US Senate hearing put bitcoin firmly in the mainstream and triggered fresh support from countries that tend to fall in line with America's financial regulatory regime.
